author: Matthew Lockard
comment: This app is frustrating to use and does not have the same search functions or user interface as Sandicor Mobile did. I want Sandicor Mobile back and find this app infuriating so much that I avoid using it. It makes mobile MLS access remind me of early 1990's attempts at apps not the polished Sandicor Mobile it replaces.

author: Audra Martin Jancic
comment: As an Agent, this app is AWESOME! The school features and info, the ease and use of finding and viewing homes in any area. I give it 4.8 stars.  If 2 minor things get fixed, it will be a 5 star!

author: Sid Parsons
comment: I have been using this application since it was first released.  My base of operation is in Phoenix, AZ. I have been very satisfied with the performance that this application provides.  In addition to Arizona I have used it in rural Tennessee, , Texas . Arkansas, and New Mexico.  It is easy to use and works well for both rentals and sales.  Better and more responsive that several other similar applications that I have access to.,

author: randy lawrence
comment: This is a very exciting tool to use when looking for a new home. I can just point my camera, snap a pic and with Homesnap I've learned everything I need to know about that house and without even having to call an agent or go to any home locaters.

author: Janine Koster
comment: I think it is very, very inaccurate.  My home has an appraisal of $680 000. 16351 Elizabeth Lake Rd,  Lake Hughes.  Please FIX It.

author: Jimmy Collett
comment: This thing is awesome. It combines the feel of the major real estate search sites with the local MLS with a great user interface & ties me in.

author: Israel Casasola
comment: Very nice application, but their mortgage estimator is pretty bad compared to other applications.

author: Diana Marshall
comment: Awesome!  It's neat to take a house pic and get all the details.  Very easy to use.  Love it.

author: Daniel
comment: It should at least show snaps well, but instead it's the only app that will show nothing but black for photos. Laaaame
Very Detailed Information At The Touch Of A Button, We LoVe HomeSnap!!

author: Jenny Falls
comment: Great App! Easy to use with accurate info!

author: Cristian Vlades
comment: need more features. It's a good start.

author: Danny Burbol
comment: Works surprisingly well!

author: Kathy Rodriguez
comment: This is a terrific site!

author: dee venancio
comment: Great app
Decent app

author: Marcelo Boston
comment: Great app

author: Luke Hagenbach
comment: This app is beautiful and could become a staying power if it improved features. Being a Realtor, my needs are more involved than the average consumer. Homesnap seems to be positioning as an agent offering for clients, as highlighted in the recent deal inked with NAR, which means it needs to add API integration with CRM and IDX providers so agents can better assist their clients with all data in more than one place. Also needed, a direct agent link to the Play Store rather than sending clients to a website for an invite link. Most agents won't bring clients to an app that doesn't allow them to white label or own the client relationship, so I'm not sure Homesnap will ever gain widespread agent support among top producing agents.

author: Kyle Aldrich
comment: I recommend this app over any other app out there when it comes to searching for properties. It's very intuitive, has some amazing and unique features, and it can greatly improve being able to communicate with your realtor about certain properties while using your phone.

author: Khaliq camacho
comment: What more can you ask for
Mobilicious!

author: Jean St Leger
comment: Great app. Sometimes gets hung up on address mapping to snap. But overall good app.

author: Michael Robinson
comment: Resets your filter every time you open the app.

author: Wendy Carter
comment: Easy to use, love the Rapid CMA and better than Zillow

author: Jeanie Bennett
comment: Really easy to use !!!

author: Bhavin Shah
comment: Great App for both Realtors and Clinets alike but needs some updates urgently. I'd like to request an in-App print support and the abaility to make lists to organize multiple showings.

author: Oron Carty
comment: Great app for all things real estate!

author: Vic Vas
comment: As a  Real Estate Investor it's worked great for me.

author: Scott
comment: Seems good but there are no listings in my city, SLC.

author: Lisa Hagerman
comment: This app is more up to date than other real estate apps. I recommend this to all of my clients.

author: Melissa Silva
comment: Doesn't work for looking for homes. Not helpful at all. Deleting it now

author: tito ventura
comment: Agent never answer back

author: Frank F. Rodriguez, Jr.
comment: Very Impressed With This App!!!

author: Gerald McCullough
comment: I love it

author: Barry Suttles
comment: This app has lots of great features. I was using it today and it works great.  It is just one more tool in the tool chest that makes my job easier as i'm helping my clients.
It's the most accurate real estate app I've used and easy to use. Very informative.

author: Shermaine Sacasa
comment: Homesnap is great!

author: Bambi Duvall
comment: I like that you can communicate with your agent and others on listings. I wish that you could save a search preference though. The listings sent based on zip codes that you have looked at are annoying because they fill up your newsfeed and can't be removed or opted out of.

author: Matt Bogosian
comment: At first I liked it but it started constantly crashing on me. I tried reinstalling it and it didn't work. There also are not enough filters in the search section.

author: corvette290
comment: This is a great app to offer your clients. When they are looking for a home to purchase it conveniently shows all the homes on the market in the neighborhood they are driving through or they can chose any other location.
